name: Drunken Monkey Cocktail
description: Drunken Monkey Cocktail - a vibrant fruity tiki drink just like we experienced in the Caribbean.
directions: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice and add the juice, coconut rum, spiced rum, and 4-5 shakes of bitters. Shake for 30 seconds.
Pour into 2 iced tumblers or one tall glass. Then pour in 1-2 teaspoons of cherry juice and let it settle at the bottom of the glass. Garnish with a lime slice, pineapple wedge, and a cherry.
Zest fresh nutmeg over the top and serve!
